idea-plugin.name: JUnit 4 to 5 converter
idea-plugin.description: Convert your JUnit 4 tests into JUnit 5 Jupiter with the simple contextual converter
idea-plugin.change-notes:
First version in which a convection between these annotations is possible: * @Test with parameters => wrapped analogues for JUnit 5 * @BeforeClass / @AfterClass => @BeforeAll / @AfterAll * @Before / @After => @BeforeEach / @AfterEach * @Ignore with a comment => @Disabled with the same comment
... under construction. More features to come!
